short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the search of http://gtr.rcuk.ac.uk/ with data visualisation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We have attempted to augment the display of Gateway to Research's data(http://gtr.rcuk.ac.uk/). By providing a graph, one can explore the connections between people, projects and organisations
